en.title: FE Making Waves in Thailand! (1)
en.content:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at JJ Mall, Chatucak, Bangkok, Thailand on Friday 20th January 2009 was a HUGE SUCCESS with 1700 Leaders, Members, VIPs and invited guests. FE's Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee attended the grand event together wih PDs from Malaysia including KC Phoon, Sam Ho, Jeffrey Choong, Chua See See and Calvin Low.

Thai VIPs who attended include FE Thai Advisory Board Chairman, former Army Commander of Southern Thailand Region, General Dato Kitti Ratanachaya, former Supreme Court Judge and now Senior Judge Wibool Nonthasoot, TTV (Thai TV) President and Owner Dr Kraiwat Sriwuthivong, Professor Dr Pichai Tovivich PhD, former Head of Chemistry Department Chulalongkorn University, well known actors Sombat Methanee, Rid Lurshaa, Kecha Plianvithee, Sakda Thongchai, Assawin Rattanaprasha, Duang Chewan Komolsen, Krai Khansit, Film Director Shaluay Srirattana, well known singers Surachai Sombatjaroen, Surabordin Sombatjaroen and Looktan Dansawan.

Many of Thailand's Muay Thai, WBC and WBA Champions also attended including Narurat, Tukkatatong, Pongsaklek, Oledong, Noknoi, Medngoen, Yodsanan together with sports announcer of BBTV Channel 7, Patr Jeungkarnkul and well known Muay Thai boxing commenter Chaitat Salatan (K.Piak).

FE would like to thank well known Channel TPBS personalities Supacol Klinsuwan and Dr Roongtip Chotnapali for a wonderful job MCing for the night! A BIG THANK YOU to FE's Thai Country Licensee Don Chan and team and to FE's top Leader in Thailand PD Jangkij and team for their commitment and leadership for making the event a GREAT SUCCESS! AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!

HIGHLIGHTS OF EVENT :

- Grand Entry by VIPs.

- Song and Dance Performances by Famous Singers Surachai Sombatjaroen,
  Surabordin Sombatjaroen and Looktan Dansawan.

- Opening Speeches by Don Chan, General Kitti and KS Lee.

- Mock Cheque Presentation and Donation of Baht 100,000 to Local Charity,
  Thailand Association of the Blind, Witnessed by VIPs on Stage.

- Speech by Paul Ting on FE's Global Charity Initiative "Hope for Children" and Social
  Entrepreneurship as a Cornerstone of FE's Global Expansion.

- Recognition of FE's Thai PD's and EDs with Awarding of Certificates by Senior Judge Wibool
  Nonthasoot and Witnessed by Paul Ting, KS Lee, General Kitti, Don Chan, KC Phoon, Jangkij and
  Sam Ho. Congratulations!

- Presentation of QPs to Muay Thai, WBC and WBA Boxing Champions.

- Demonstrations of Quantum Pendant by PDs KC Phoon and Jangkij.

- Testimonial and Sharing by Professor Dr Pichai Tovivich PhD, Former Head of Chemistry Dept.
  Chulalongkorn University on Scalar Energy.

- Lucky Draws.

 
< Click here for more photos >

- Mock Cheque Presentation and Donation of Baht 100,000 to Local Charity, Thailand Association of the Blind, Witnessed by VIPs on Stage.
- Speech by Paul Ting on FE's Global Charity Initiative "Hope for Children" and Social Entrepreneurship as a Cornerstone of FE's Global Expansion.

- Testimonial and Sharing by Professor Dr Pichai Tovivich PhD, Former Head of Chemistry Dept. Chulalongkorn University on Scalar Energy.
- Lucky Draws./
